title: [Discussion] can any senior in pes electronic city tell how are the placements for cse there?.what is the avg package .what is the percentage of students getting placed.highest package from there
content: can any senior in pes electronic city tell how are the placements for cse there?.what is the avg package .what is the percentage of students getting placed.highest package from there

comments.body: I am not a senior but few days back i visited ec and went to placement cell, cse ec average was 14.5 or 15 and 70% were placed

placements are pooled across both campuses.   
This is the [official NAAC link](https://pes.edu/naac/doc.html?file=upload/nirf/NIRF_2025_PES_University_Engineering.pdf) for median and no of ppl placed (check academic year 2020-21).  
Highest package is 56 LPA , i think it was phonepe.

Idt anyone maintains campus wise placement data, it's combined for both 
Just search reddit for it
Do you have a photo by any chance?
no, but they have written on a whiteboard in placement cell room you can check from there
Please check the FAQ section of the community. All the placement-related data is already available in the spreadsheet shared there.
